p: Effects of A. muricata and C. trifoliatum extracts at sub-MICs on adhesion of A. triangularis were determined in 96-well polystyrene plastic plates. As shown in Figure 1, both extracts substantially reduced the adhesion of A. triangularis trophozoites (Figures 1A and 2) and cysts (Figures 1B and 3) to the plastic surface (P < 0.05). Approximately 40% decrease in the trophozoites adhesion to the plastic surface was observed, while 60% inhibition was also detected in cysts treated with both extracts at 1/2×MIC. At the time point, non-encystation of the trophozoites was observed when the cells were challenged with the extracts as shown in Figure 2.
